summary: A set of functions that will allow you to treat several smaller arrays (in this case, 4) as one very large array, without having to manage it yourself. The functions are designed to work like FormList functions for ease of use.
descriptionHtml:
A set of functions that will allow you to treat several smaller arrays (in this case, 4) as one very large array, without having to manage it yourself. The functions are designed to work like FormList functions for ease of use.

Please see [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1413790-resource-beyond-128-extended-array-functions-to-go-to-512-and-up]this Bethesda Forums post[/url] for details.

This page includes a download to a test mod that contains the script files used in the test cases cited at the bottom of the post. It is complete: you can install it via Nexus Mod Manager, and it will execute the test cases on game start-up. Please see your Papyrus log for test results. You can use the included source file to copy functions into your own scripts.

Please also see: [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1365378-exampleresourcegeneral-purpose-array-functions]General Purpose Array Functions[/url]

Enjoy,

- Chesko
author: Chesko
